climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 5S Slow Rebound Memory Foam Pillow: The neck pillow is designed to provide both support for the head and neck and comfort for a good night's sleep. The memory foam pillows shape automatically when firmly pressed and rebounds within 5 seconds when there is no pressure applied, maintaining its shape throughout the year without deformation. The slow rebound design ensures the neck support pillow providing a comfortable, pressure-free sleeping experience.

Contour Design for Any Sleep Style: The foam pillow is with size: 23.5 x 13.4 x 4.9/3.4 inches ( L x W x H). Contour pillow is designed with two adjustable heights to support the neck and head for any sleeping position, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping, and low pillow sleepers.

Breathable Skin-friendly Pillowcase: The pillow for sleeping with breathable skin-friendly fabric and soft makes you experience a deep sleep all night. The orthopedic pillow features excellent moisture absorption and breath-ability, maintaining consistent firmness and comfort throughout the year.

Pillow to Relieve Neck and Shoulder Pain: The contour pillow is customized to fit the physiological curve of the body, providing a supportive and comfortable cervical curve. With the personalized customized shape, the cervical pillow fits the contours of the head, neck, and shoulders, greatly relieving pain and reducing shoulder pressure for a healthy sleep, allowing users to wake up in the morning without pain.

Best Gift Choice: The pillow is an excellent solution to prevent cervical vertebrae problems and help reduce sleepless nights. This contour pillow suitable for all ages. you can choose this cervical pillow for your family or friend with confidence. If for any reason you're not satisfied with the pillow, please feel free to contact us. We offers 24-month product worry-free and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5S Slow Rebound Memory Foam The pillow will rebound within 5S when no press, non-deformation all the year. Perfect firmness, ideal balance between soft and support. Soft & Breathable Pillowcase The pillowcase is made of soft comfortable fabric and mesh sides, removable and machine-washable. The pillow cover does not pill and suits for all seasons. Ergonomic Pillow Pillowcase is equipped with a premium zipper, smooth and convenient. In addition, the pillow is available in two heights to conform the contours of your head, neck and shoulders, relieving pain and achieving a healthy deep sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dreamy Comfort with the Memory Foam Neck Pillow
reviews.reviewText: Comfort and Support: The memory foam is the star of the show here. It cradles the head and neck with a gentle firmness that feels both supportive and incredibly comfortable. The foam molds to the shape of your neck, providing a personalized sleeping experience that has significantly reduced my morning stiffness and discomfort.Quality of Sleep: Since switching to this pillow, my sleep quality has improved dramatically. I fall asleep faster, and the number of times I wake up at night has decreased. I wake up feeling refreshed and ready to tackle the day, which was rarely the case before.Durability and Maintenance: The pillow has maintained its shape and firmness over time, showing no signs of sagging or wear. The removable cover is a great addition, making it easy to keep the pillow clean and hygienic.Hypoallergenic Features: As someone sensitive to allergens, I appreciate that this pillow is hypoallergenic. It's comforting to know that I'm not breathing in anything harmful during the night.Overall Experience: This Memory Foam Neck Pillow has transformed my sleep experience. It offers the perfect balance of comfort and support, is easy to maintain, and is suitable for those with allergies. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a better night's sleep. It's a small investment for a significant improvement in sleep quality and overall well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and firm!
reviews.reviewText: It's a really nice pillow that can stand up to the tempurpedic that costs twice as much. This will stop any neck pain the you have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just received this pillow and I really like it so far. It feels great under my neck and gives me lots of support. I’m a side sleeper and it does very well for me. I think this will really help my neck pain. The only complaint I have is the smell of it. I’m going to wash the cover and hopefully that will help. I’m not sure what the odor is but I’m pretty sensitive to smells and it’s not great. But I’m keeping it because of the pillow itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firmer than other memory pillows I’ve had. That’s a plus because will get flat by time
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping. As described. A bit on the firm side rather than soft. Contoured with neck shape. Can use both edges if one edge is too high for you. Gives me a comfortable side sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth every penny...
reviews.reviewText: I do not have neck pain. I just wanted a pillow that wouldn't eventually flatten out on the edge where my neck was. I wanted my neck and head to be aligned. Just couldn't sleep otherwise. This pillow is perfect. It's soft and yet still has the roll to raise my head or neck a little. Haven't washed the cover. I can see that it might be difficult to get in or out of the cover because the zipper doesn't go all the way. Can't say it's a concern. Speaking of concerns...I saw a few reviews that mentioned the smell of the pillow. Mine was as fresh as could be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow a few weeks ago and it was a great pillow! However, I bought it again last week to be shipped to my Florida location and what I got was NOT the same pillow that I previously purchased. It’s a cheap imitation - foam is very soft, raised section is pretty flat and the pillow is much smaller - by several inches! Is this a difference between states?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Struggled for years finding the right pillow. This one meets my needs for side and back sleep. Extremely comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It sure is a pillow!
reviews.reviewText: 10 years ago I got the same ergonomic pillow as this one (but different supplier) and I decided I needed a new one. This pillow is really good, it is essentially the same as my old pillow, packaged well and keeps my head and body at the same level where there are little to no neck pain/cramps!I would have to say, it is a little too firm for my liking, but Im not too worried about that, It will either soften up overtime or I will get use to it.If that is a big worry for you, I would suggest look for another pillow.But if you are the type to love firm pillows, this product is perfect for you!Not much else to say but is a pillow and does its basic job!
very good pillow, quit comfortable and good size
Supports my head and neck and helps relieve pain (alongside other helpful strategies).
